snippet: The Jefferies Group, the investment bank and brokerage firm, agreed to settle accusations by the Securities and Exchange Commission that it failed to supervise traders who lied to investors about the price of mortgage-backed securities.
abstract: The Jefferies Group, the investment bank and brokerage firm, agreed to settle accusations by the Securities and Exchange Commission that it failed to supervise traders who lied to investors about the price of mortgage-backed securities.

headline.main: Jefferies in $25 Million Settlement With S.E.C.
